Title: GRAbB_on_Centos
Description:
GRAbB (Genome Region Assembly by Baiting) is program designed to assemble selected regions of the genome or transcriptome using reference sequences and NGS data.

This asciinema cast wishes to show how to set it up on Centos.

GRAbB is available via Github [https://github.com/b-brankovics/grabb] and via Docker [https://hub.docker.com/r/brankovics/grabb/].
